item.description:
Hey everyone, it's time for another Sunday morning discussion at the Nu Cafe.  Please note the time change - 10 a.m. til 12 noon so that those attending Kara's Concord walking tour can get there in plenty of time.  We'll be discussing current topics in the news, including the FFRF:

The FFRF (Freedom from Religion Foundation) has been in the news again recently because of a letter sent Providence, RI about the presence of a cross on a war memorial erected in 1921.  After the recent decision re Jessica Ahlquist and the Cranston HS prayer..is this the same situation? Do you agree with what the FFRF is doing? 

 

 


 

 

 

 

--
Robyn
item.name: Sunday Morning Discussion Group at Nu Cafe
